Document.name: CopyFrom
Document.typeparam: Type of the elements in the source container.
Document.param: Pointer to the first element in the source array.
Pointer to the element after the last element in the source array.
Set to false to delete everything in the destination container before copying.
Document.signature: template < typename Ds, typename S > void(Ds &, S const *, S const *, bool /* optional */);
